pages.text: These are all of the recipe changes pertaining to Create.

$(li)All Machinery is crafted in the Pigment Pedestal; more recipes gradually unlock as you work with more machinery.$(li)Added Pyrite Chunk and Bone Ash to Deployer.$(li)Andesite Alloy must be crafted with yttrium.$(li)Sturdy Sheets require 250L of Midnight Solution instead of 500L of Lava.$(li)Precision Mechanisms are crafted in the Fusion Shrine, with added Magenta Pigment and Storm Stone.
$(li)Machine recipes that require advanced materials only unlock upon acquiring them.
